text: The United States competed at the 1933 World Archery Championships in London, Great Britain from 31 July to 5 August 1933. The United States entered 1 archer and competed in the men's individual events, with Donald MacKenzie winning gold.http://www.archery.org/UserFiles/Document/Results/Results/Before2006/Outdoor/1933_Outdoor.pdfHistory of FITA ==Events== ===Recurve=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Archer !Event !Score !Rank |- align=center |align=left|Donald MacKenzie |Individual recurve |1126 | |} ==References== Category:World Archery Championships Category:1933 in American sports Category:1933 in archery Category:Archery in the United States
title: United States at the 1933 World Archery Championships
